name: Nimble Fish
description: Help the little fish to collect all the coins and survive in the dangerous and merciless sea. Interesting arcade game with nice graphics and simple controls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
